SEARCH
Package Abstract

Class Repository<T extends IEntity>

java.lang.Object
Abstract.Repository<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity that extends IEntity.
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminRepository, AppointmentOutcomeRepository, AppointmentRepository, DoctorRepository, InventoryRepository, LeavesRepository, MedicalRecordRepository, PatientRepository, PharmacistRepository, PrescriptionRepository, StaffRepository, UserRepository
public abstract class Repository<T extends IEntity> extends Object
Abstract base class for managing entities stored in a CSV file. This class provides common CRUD operations and caching mechanisms for entities implementing the IEntity interface.

    • readCSV

      protected List<String> readCSV(String path)
      Reads all lines from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of strings, each representing a line in the CSV file.

      Creates a new entity and adds it to the repository.
